title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 69.2 - How appeal to be commenced; time
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 69.2 - How appeal to be commenced; time

State Regulations
(a) An appeal under section 75 of article 5 of the Defense Emergency Act shall be
commenced by filing a written petition with the board at its Albany office on
or before the 20th day after the petitioner has received written notice of, and
a copy of, the commissioner's determination. (b) The petition shall be filed by mailing or
delivering the original and three conformed copies thereof to the board at its

Albany office. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12

69.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
